epic.title: Support & Maintenance
epic.summary: Comprehensive customer support and system maintenance framework ensuring 24/7 assistance, rapid issue resolution, and continuous system improvements to maintain high service quality and user satisfaction.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive customer support and system maintenance framework ensuring 24/7 assistance, rapid issue resolution, and continuous system improvements to maintain high service quality and user satisfaction. The system provides round-the-clock support, proactive maintenance, and regular feature updates to ensure healthcare organizations can rely on the platform for their critical operations.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Customer support ticketing system
- Live chat and phone support infrastructure
- Knowledge base platform
- System health monitoring and alerting
- Automated deployment pipeline
- Rollback and version control system
- Feature release management
- Security patch management system
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Month 1:**
- Support infrastructure setup (phone, chat, ticketing)

**Month 2:**
- Knowledge base and documentation

**Month 3:**
- Monitoring and maintenance automation

**Month 4:**
- Deployment pipeline and rollback capabilities

**Ongoing:**
- Continuous support operations and maintenance
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Large Healthcare Network**

- **Challenge:** Slow support response, frequent downtime, user frustration
- **Outcome:** 24/7 support, <5 min response time, 99.9% uptime, 85% first call resolution

stories.title: 24/7 phone and chat support
stories.description: Provide 24/7 phone and chat support to ensure healthcare organizations can receive assistance at any time, supporting critical healthcare operations that operate around the clock.

stories.title: Average response time < 5 minutes for critical issues
stories.description: Maintain average response time of less than 5 minutes for critical issues to ensure rapid resolution of problems that impact patient care or system availability.

stories.title: First call resolution rate > 80%
stories.description: Achieve first call resolution rate greater than 80% to resolve most issues on the initial contact, improving customer satisfaction and reducing support workload.

stories.title: Dedicated account manager for enterprise clients
stories.description: Assign dedicated account managers to enterprise clients to provide personalized support, strategic guidance, and ensure high-value customer relationships.

stories.title: Online knowledge base and video tutorials
stories.description: Maintain comprehensive online knowledge base and video tutorials to enable self-service support and reduce support ticket volume while improving user education.

stories.title: Monthly feature releases
stories.description: Deliver monthly feature releases to provide regular enhancements, new capabilities, and continuous improvement of the healthcare platform.

stories.title: Weekly security patches
stories.description: Apply weekly security patches to address vulnerabilities promptly and maintain system security posture in the face of evolving threats.

stories.title: Zero-downtime deployments for most updates
stories.description: Implement zero-downtime deployment capabilities for most updates to ensure continuous availability of critical healthcare systems during maintenance.

stories.title: Rollback capability within 15 minutes
stories.description: Provide rollback capability to revert deployments within 15 minutes to quickly recover from issues and minimize impact on healthcare operations.

stories.title: System health monitoring dashboard
stories.description: Provide system health monitoring dashboard to track system performance, availability, and key metrics, enabling proactive issue detection and resolution.
